'''Hubel''' is a [[shop]] [[NPC]] located in [[Court of Fontaine]], [[Fontaine]]. 

He sells [[Book|books]] from various collections.

Next to his shop is a [[Newsstand Board]].

==Idle Quotes==

: {{DIcon|Idle}} Headlines these days...
:: {{A|VO Hubel 01.ogg}} "Ah... So these are the kind of headlines they're going for these days..."
{{Dialogue End}}

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Hubel:''' Welcome, welcome to this fair ocean of words!
:{{DIcon|Shop}} I'll have a look, no problem.
::'''Hubel:''' Take your time. Personally, I'd recommend a thriller!
:{{DIcon}} And you are...?
::'''Hubel:''' You can call me the... temporary owner of this little establishment.
::'''Hubel:''' I say "temporary," for it is my dream to join [[The Steambird]]!
::'''Hubel:''' I work hard every day, honing my scripts and accumulating rhetoric to constantly improve my understanding of the art of language!
::'''Hubel:''' One day, I'll report all I've seen, and my astounding literary skills will spill across the headlines!
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Hubel:''' We refresh our lineup often, so come back again soon!
{{Dialogue End}}
